desc: Get Synched! Learning happens when you can effectively connect with the topic you are studying. NEW PERSPECTIVES ON COMPUTER CONCEPTS 2012 makes it possible. Creating a fully integrated and interactive learning environment, NEW PERSPECTIVES ON COMPUTER CONCEPTS 2012 combines a printed book with media-rich assets, enabling you to work in sync to explore, understand, and apply computer technology in everyday life.
title: New Perspectives on Computer Concepts 2012: Introductory (SAM 2010 Compatible Products)
